section.p: Talanexor concedes defeat rather than suffer the full effect of your conjurations. A tribunal finds him guilty of besmirching your good name and orders him to pay you by way of compensation. As he counts out the money he gives you a glowering look and says under his breath: ‘You’ll lie in your grave before you can spend the last of these coins. See if you can deflect that curse!’
He turns and strides away. Get the codeword Cheese and .
